text: ^ I almost always suggest not having HubSpot load those scripts/pixels through its own HubSpot tracking tag - I prefer explicit control over how/when my ad-tech stuff fires through something like GTM. The ads features were developed more for SMB's who don't have the data-operations chops to handle stuff like that on their own.
You don't "have" to let HubSpot load those pixels for the ads tool to function, in fact any type of accurate conversion tracking is best done on your own.
